app.name: Woopra
app.short_description: Woopra helps companies better assist their users by giving them visibility what users have done on their website or app.
app.long_description: Combine Woopra's real-time behavioral data with Zendesk to proactively resolve issues and increase enagagement. Support reps can immediately understand a userâ€™s behavior in order to troubleshoot quickly and without burdening the user with unnecessary questions and delays. Streamline support and provide personalized guidance with real-time, unified data in Woopra.
